response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe its true value exceeds $8,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $12,000. This price reflects its superior craftsmanship, advanced technology, and the unparalleled service we provide with every purchase. I trust this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency, convenience, and satisfaction. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 12000}
